title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in thousand units, with a total of 15 data points.
Overall Sales in thousand units has increased over the Year
Sales in thousand units is roughly constant from 2004 to 2008, gradually decreasing from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, and lastly rapidly constant from 2011 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Max Sales in thousand units about 384.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Sales in thousand units about 60.0 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in thousand units, with a total of 15 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012 to 2018.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2012.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2004 to 2007.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
